00019 #ifndef YS_TRANS_FULL_H
00020 #define YS_TRANS_FULL_H
00021 
00022 #include "ys_inv_type.h"
00023 #include "ys_cust_type.h"
00024 #include "ys_employee_type.h"
00025 #include "ys_trans_type.h"
00026 #include "xmlnode.h"
00027 
00028 class YardFullTransaction: public XMLNode
00029 {
00030  public:
00031      YardFullTransaction():XMLNode() {}
00032  
00033      vector<long> GetItemsId() const
00034     {
00035         vector<long> ret;
00036         for (NodeMap::const_iterator it = m_xmlData->m_children.begin();
00037              it != m_xmlData->m_children.end(); it++)
00038             ret.push_back(YardTransType(it->second).GetItem());
00039         return ret;
00040     }
00041         
00042     vector<YardTransType> GetTransactions() const
00043     {   // oh the sexiness of templates!
00044         return children<YardTransType>("Transaction_Log_Table");
00045     }
00046     
00047     unsigned int CountItems() const
00048     { 
00049         long count = 0;
00050         for (NodeMap::const_iterator it = m_xmlData->m_children.begin();
00051          it != m_xmlData->m_children.end(); it++)
00052             count += YardTransType(it->second).GetQuantity();
00053         return count;            
00054     }
00055         
00056     string GetQuantityS(long index) const
00057         { return YardTransType(child("Transaction_Log_Table", index)).GetQuantityS(); }
00058         
00059     long GetQuantity(long index) const
00060         { return ToLong(GetQuantityS(index)); }
00061         
00062    string GetComment(long index) const
00063         { return YardTransType(child("Transaction_Log_Table", index)).GetComment(); }
00064                 
00065     YardDate GetTime(long index) const
00066         { return YardTransType(child("Transaction_Log_Table", index)).GetTime(); }
00067         
00068      /* member functions */
00069     double SubTotal(const vector<YardTransType> transVect);
00070     
00071     map<string, float> GetTaxes() const
00072         {
00073             map<string, float> tax;
00074             return tax;
00075         }
00076 
00077 };
00078 
00079 #endif
